mapper.select: SELECT product_id, product_category, product_brand, product_name, product_description, recommended_price, product_status, updated_at, created_at FROM products WHERE product_id = #{productId};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO products (product_id, product_category, product_brand, product_name, product_description, recommended_price, product_status) VALUES (#{productId}, #{productCategory}, #{productBrand}, #{productName}, #{productDescription}, #{recommendedPrice}, #{productStatus});
mapper.update: UPDATE products SET product_category = #{productCategory}, product_brand = #{productBrand}, product_name = #{productName}, product_description = #{productDescription}, recommended_price = #{recommendedPrice}, product_status = #{productStatus} WHERE product_id = #{productId};
